title: Triple-digits temperatures expected across U.S. Southwest as global heat shows no signs of easing
description: With global temperatures rising, the Southwestern U.S. is facing triple-digit, record-breaking heat as states race to keep up with energy demand.

title: New app Ahoi makes cities more accessible to people with disabilities
description: A crowdsourcing app called Ahoi helps people with disabilities navigate their neighborhoods. NBC News' Zinhle Essamuah talks to Ahoi's founder, Jake Haendel, about how it works.

title: Turkey agrees to back Sweden's NATO bid, alliance secretary general says
description: Turkey has agreed to support Sweden's bid to join the NATO military alliance after a year of opposition, NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said on Monday.

title: Air Force delays bonuses and new assignments amid political feud over Space Command’s new headquarters
description: The U.S. Air Force is delaying reenlistment bonuses and change of station orders for personnel after Alabama lawmakers cut funding for the service amid an argument over Space Command’s new headquarters.

title: Europe signs off on a new privacy pact that allows people’s data to keep flowing to U.S.
description: The European Union signed off Monday on a new agreement over the privacy of people’s personal information that gets pinged across the Atlantic, aiming to ease European concerns about electronic spying by American intelligence agencies.

title: James Lewis, prime suspect in unsolved 1982 Tylenol murders case, dies at 76
description: The sole suspect investigators believed was responsible for the 1982 Tylenol murders in Chicago has died, police said Monday.

title: YouTuber Colleen Ballinger has several live shows and podcast canceled
description: Several of YouTuber Colleen Ballinger’s upcoming live shows appear to have been canceled amid ongoing backlash over her alleged relationships with underage fans.

title: Big question hangs over NATO summit: Will Zelenskyy show up?
description: The big question hanging over the high-profile NATO summit this week is whether Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy will show up.

title: Look up: Northern Lights could be visible in 17 states this week
description: U.S. residents with clear skies could witness a rare occurrence this week as the Northern Lights are expected to be visible from 17 states.

title: Threads hits 100 million users, fueling doubts about Twitter
description: User traffic on Twitter has slowed since the launch of Meta’s text-based platform Threads, which has already surpassed 100 million sign-ups since its debut last week, according to a third party tracker.

title: A resurgent online betting market is boosted by crypto and current events
description: A resurgent online betting market is getting more attention as users follow current events like Russia’s war in Ukraine and the OceanGate submersible implosion.

title: Larry Nassar was stabbed multiple times at Florida federal prison
description: Larry Nassar, the disgraced sports doctor who was convicted of sexually abusing female gymnasts, was stabbed multiple times during an altercation with another inmate at a federal prison in Florida, a prison union leader said Monday.

title: 14 million under flash flood alerts after deadly flooding in New York
description: Live updates: 14 million under flash flood alerts after deadly flooding in New York

title: Sarah Silverman sues Meta, OpenAI for copyright infringement
description: Comedian Sarah Silverman and two authors have filed copyright infringement lawsuits against Meta Platforms and OpenAI for allegedly using their content without permission to train artificial intelligence language models.

title: Putin met Prigozhin days after mercenary leader led mutiny
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin met with the Wagner mercenary chief days after they threatened to topple the country’s military leadership, the Kremlin said.

title: A collision course over government funding raises fears of a shutdown
description: A battle over how to fund the government is brewing between House Republicans and the Senate ahead of a Sept. 30 deadline to avoid a shutdown.

title: Biden arrives in London ahead of key Ukraine talks at NATO summit
description: Biden arrives in London ahead of key Ukraine talks at NATO summit

title: Rare flash flood warning issued  for New York as a woman dies trying to evacuate
description: Federal forecasters issued a rare flash flood warning for much of New York City Sunday night as heavy rain in the Northeast caused at least one death.

title: 1st victim of alleged Philadelphia mass shooter was killed 44 hours earlier, police say
description: The first of five people killed by a mass shooter in Philadelphia last week was most likely fatally shot about 44 hours before the others, authorities said Sunday.
